name: TeddyBearShooter
body:
XNA-based shooter featuring animated tiling, scoring, and sounds.
Created as an optional project for an online course.
![TeddyBearShooter preview](http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z449/dshatski/Stuff/TeddyBearShooter_zpsfa268d88.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
